item.title: Credential Switcher - A PowerShell script to easily switch between credentials to access a SMB network share
item.description:
Credential Switcher

A simple PowerShell script that allows the user to temporarily switch to use different credentials with higher permissions to carry out specific tasks and reverts back to the original credentials automatically after some time or once the user confirms the task is completed.

item.title: SuperDucky
item.description: SuperDucky is an enhanced version of Hack5 Rubber Ducky BadUSB.

item.title: About
item.description: Álvaro Orgaz is an Information Security professional currently working for a National Security company in Abu Dhabi. At the age of 9 started coding on a Commodore PET 4032 until it ran out of memory, since then he has been passionate about computers, electronics and technology. He enjoys researching and engaging into all sorts of hacking projects to keep his skills sharp, from hardware security to machine learning or reverse engineering.
